Hey friends üëã 

You might be interested in some of our doc blocks if you want to document your design system in Storybook üòÅ 

- [ColorPalette](https://storybook.js.org/docs/react/api/doc-block-colorpalette)

We don't currently have anything for spacing, elevation, or borders but it wouldn't be too difficult to put together a couple of components to do that.

I wrote [something](https://github.com/Integrayshaun/design-tokens-sandbox) a little while ago to read design token files and generate design system doc pages in Storybook that you could use as inspiration.
